mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,ID ,NICNAME ,TITLE ,REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE IMSI =#{imsi}
mapper.update: UPDATE C_INQUIRY SET TITLE=#{title},CONTENT=#{content},REALFILE=#{realfile} WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND IMSI=#{imsi}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND IMSI=#{imsi}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,ID ,NICNAME ,TITLE ,REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE IMSI =#{imsi}
mapper.update: UPDATE C_INQUIRY SET TITLE=#{title},CONTENT=#{content},REALFILE=#{realfile} WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND IMSI=#{imsi}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE SEQ='SEQ' AND IMSI=#{imsi}
